channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- NUC Kits
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- NUC Kits

item.title: CVE-2017-5700|2024-08-05T15:11:48.736Z -- intel%20corporation -- nuc%20kits
item.description: Insufficient protection of password storage in system firmware for Intel NUC7i3BNK, NUC7i3BNH, NUC7i5BNK, NUC7i5BNH, NUC7i7BNH versions BN0049 and below allows local attackers to bypass Administrator and User passwords via access to password storage.

item.title: CVE-2017-5722|2024-08-05T15:11:48.306Z -- intel%20corporation -- nuc%20kits
item.description: Incorrect policy enforcement in system firmware for Intel NUC7i3BNK, NUC7i3BNH, NUC7i5BNK, NUC7i5BNH, NUC7i7BNH versions BN0049 and below allows attackers with local or physical access to bypass enforcement of integrity protections via manipulation of firmware storage.

item.title: CVE-2017-5701|2024-08-05T15:11:48.420Z -- intel%20corporation -- nuc%20kits
item.description: Insecure platform configuration in system firmware for Intel NUC7i3BNK, NUC7i3BNH, NUC7i5BNK, NUC7i5BNH, NUC7i7BNH versions BN0049 and below allows an attacker with physical presence to run arbitrary code via unauthorized firmware modification during BIOS Recovery.

item.title: CVE-2017-5721|2024-08-05T15:11:48.486Z -- intel%20corporation -- nuc%20kits
item.description: Insufficient input validation in system firmware for Intel NUC7i3BNK, NUC7i3BNH, NUC7i5BNK, NUC7i5BNH, NUC7i7BNH versions BN0049 and below allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code via manipulation of memory.
